QuestData.Title: Weeds of the Mire
QuestData.Description:
<Magura weakly opens her eyes as you approach.>
Help me... weak... can't heal...
<Magura struggles to raise an arm to point towards a nearby plant.>
Graveweed... help... more... please...
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa sprigs of Graveweed from the Dreadmire.
